Package SqlQuery

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAuthor
    This class builds add Author query from data generated by add Author interface.
    AddBook
    This class builds add book query from data generated by add book interface.
    AddGenre
    This class builds add genre query from data generated by add genre interface.
    AddPublisher
    This class builds add publisher query from data generated by add publisher interface.
    ChoiceBoxes
    This class builds choice box data for selection
    DeleteAuthor
    This class builds delete Author query from data generated by delete Author interface.
    DeleteBook
    This class builds delete book query from data generated by delete book interface.
    DeleteGenre
    This class builds delete Genre query from data generated by delete Genre interface.
    DeletePublisher
    This class builds delete Publisher query from data generated by delete Publisher interface.
    FirstBook
    This class Collect details of first book in database when system initialises.
    RetrieveSettings
    This class provides SQL for retrieving settings held in the database.
    SchemaSetupManager
    This class creates the database schema when executed on system first use.
    SearchAuthor
    This class builds search Author query when requested by Choice Box on delete Author interface.
    SearchBook
    This class manages search data generated by Book searches.
    SearchGenre
    This class builds search Genre query when requested by Choice Box on delete Genre interface.
    SearchPublisher
    This class builds search Publisher query when requested by Choice Box on delete Publisher interface.
    SetSettings
    This class provides SQL for updating settings held in the database.
    UpdateAuthor
    This class builds update Author query from data generated by update Author interface.
    UpdateBook
    This class builds update book query from data generated by update book interface.
    UpdateGenre
    This class builds update Genre query from data generated by update Genre interface.
    UpdatePublisher
    This class builds update Publisher query from data generated by update book interface.
